text: William Evan Sanders (December 25, 1919 â€“ November 18, 2021) was an American Episcopalian prelate. He was the eighth bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of Tennessee from 1977 to 1985, and first bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of East Tennessee from 1985 to 1992. He was born in Natchez, Mississippi. Sanders died on November 18, 2021 in Nashville, Tennessee at the age of 101.A Death in Our East Tennessee Family ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:People from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Episcopalian bishops Category:People from Natchez, Mississippi
title: William Evan Sanders
